languages-and-frameworks.description: We've placed development languages (such as Scala or Golang) here, as well as more low-level development frameworks (such as Play or Symfony), which are useful for implementing custom software of all kinds.

methods-and-patterns.description: Here we put information on methods and patterns concerning development, continuous x, testing, organization, architecture, etc.

platforms-and-aoe-services.description: Here we include infrastructure platforms and services. We also use this category to communicate news about AOE services that we want all AOE teams to be aware of.

tools.description: Here we put different software tools - from small helpers to bigger software projects
